national_indicator_available: Proportion of women in national parliaments and local governments
comparison_sdg: The time series "Women in a) national parliaments" are compliant with the global metadata. The disaggregation  "Women in Länder parliaments" is only partly compliant with the global metadata. The time series "Women in b) local governments" is not compliant with the global metadata but provides additional information.
indicator_name: Proportion of seats held by women in (a) national parliaments and (b) local governments
target_name: Ensure women's full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life
un_designated_tier_url_alert: der Statistischen Division der Vereinten Nationen

source_organisation_3: The Federal Returning Officer

source_url_text_3b: Results of earlier elections to the Länder parliaments (only available in German)
source_organisation_4: Federal Ministry for Family Affairs, Senior Citizens, Women and Youth
source_url_text_4: Equality Atlas: Percentage of Mandates in Councils of Districts and District-Free Cities Held by Women

data_start_values.value: Proportion of women in national parliaments and local governments
Councils of districts and district-free cities

footer_fields.label: Notes
footer_fields.value:
• a) National parliaments: German Bundestag, Bundesrat and Länder parliaments.
• b) Local governments: Councils of districts and district-free cities.
• Figures to the German Bundestag and Bundesrat: Reference date January 1st.
• Data to the Länder parliaments:
- Reference date = election day.
- Subsequent candidates are not taken into account.
• Proportion of women in councils of districts and district-free cities: Election result, 2019 to 2021 without Schleswig-Holstein.

footer_fields.label: Notes
footer_fields.value:
• a) National parliaments: German Bundestag, Bundesrat and Länder parliaments.
• b) Local governments: Councils of districts and district-free cities.
• Figures to the German Bundestag and Bundesrat: Reference date January 1st.
• Data to the Länder parliaments:
- Reference date = election day.
- Subsequent candidates are not taken into account.
